title.rendered: This Week at Gottwals Books – June 26

content.rendered:
More Trades Mean More Inventory

We typically strive for the very best quality in gently used books, but we may relax those standards for books in especially high demand. Please don’t hesitate to bring in those beat up copies of school reading titles or enduring classics – we may be able to accept them, and your fellow Gottwals Books lovers will surely appreciate it!

Hot Deals for Hot Days!

Is Your Kid a Gottwals Kid?

Our weekly Kid’s Corner story time is a big hit, but we welcome children anytime! The children’s area at each Gottwals store has an assortment of Melissa & Doug® toys for hands-on enjoyment.

Our inventory includes fiction and non-fiction for all ages and the Byron and Warner Robins stores carry homeschool curriculum.

Genre of the Week

DIY Projects for the Home 

Need some inspiration for those summertime projects? Each Gottwals store has a wide selection of Home Repair, Gardening, and Decorating books.

Toy of the Week

Puffy Sticker Play Sets: $4.97

Yesterday at Kid’s Corner we gave away these adorable Puffy Sticker Play Sets! The stickers are reusable and can be layered on the double-sided background for hours of imaginative fun.

A built-in sticker collection (67 stickers in all) offers endless opportunities for kids to express their creativity and have lots of pretend dress-up fun. Simply peel up the reusable stickers to change the scenes.
